text: Hagi Moapu vahe'mo'za koro fre'za Hesboni kumate vu'gahazanagi, ome kesazana Hesboni kumara teve neresige'za kesazanagi, mago zana osu hankave'zami omanesiaza otigahaze. Hagi Hesboni kuma'ma tesania tevemo'a ko'ma Sihoni noma tevema re'nea avamente tegahie. Ana tevemo'a Moapu vahe zamasenia tehana nehuno, rankege'ma nehaza vahe zamaseni zaferina tehana hugahie.
